page.title: 09PUBLIC HOUSES &GARAGES
page.content: {WHITE LION-CASTLE STREET OWNED BY MR S. HAZE BUT HIS SON IS LOOKING AFTER IT FOR HIM.SELLS ALL SORTS OF BEER,WINES & SPIRITS AND BAR MEALS. {GOLDEN LION-CHURCH STREET OWNED BY MR THICKITT.ALSO SELLS MEALS AS WELL AS WINES,BEER&SPIRITS {GREDINGTON ARMS-CROSS STREET OWNED BY MR J.BRENNEN. {THE HAND &HEART-CASTLE STREET A BURTONWOOD PUB.IT HAS A CAR-PARK.IT IS NEXT DOOR TO THE ACADEMY GARAGE. THEY SPECIALIZE IN STEAKS AND HAVE AN A'LA CARTE MENU. {CASTLE GARAGE-CASTLE STREET OPPOSITE THE ACADEMY GARAGE.IT SELLS CARS AS WELL AS PETROL AND DIESEL. {ACADEMY GARAGE-CASTLE STREET NEXT TO THE HAND & HEART.OWNED BY A.R HUGHES &SON.IT IS A PEUGEOT/TALBOT GARAGE.ALSO SELLS SWEETS.
